div.p: The international jury of prizes awards a Gold Medal diploma to Baron Von Muller, Victoria, Australia.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt; text-align: center;

div.p:
Group V - Class 42
Group V was 'Industries extractives, produits bruts et ouvrés' [Extractive industries, raw and worked products], and Class 42 was 'Produits des exploitations et des industries forestières' [Products of lumbering and forest industries]. M's award was for 'Très belle exposition d'échantillons de bois présentés sous la forme de volumes. | Beaux herbiers et photographies montrant, dans toutes ses variétés, la flore australienne' [Very nice exhibition of wood samples presented in the form of volumes. | Beautiful herbaria and photographs showing, in all its varieties, the Australian flora]. See Ouvré (1891), p. 39.

p.style: font-family: Geneva, Geneva; font-size: 10pt;
